front.title: Network Portability Requirements and Models for Cloud Environment

abstract.t: Recent progress of virtual machine technology made it possible tohost various Internet service nodes in a so called cloud environment.The virtual machine hosting technology provides a method to migrate avirtual machine from one hypervisor to another. However, such atechnology is mainly focusing on a migration between hypervisorsattached to the same link, and tend not to consider migration overthe Internet. This document mentions the purpose of that type ofoperation and describe several possible operation methods to providenetwork portability in cloud systems.
